docs.text: what is freedom ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: how does one determine who is free ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in 1839 , those questions were more difficult to answer then they are now .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: yet , the mistakes of our forefathers must be examined in order to rectify current situations .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: that is , in essence , what steven spielberg's gripping drama " amistad " is about .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: through its various dramas , spielberg presents a case about a group of africans , who , after being seized from their home , were forced onto a ship and sent to the united states aboard " la amistad " .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: on their way there , the slaves , led by cinque ( djimon hounsou ) , rebelled , killing off part of the crew .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: however , the ship was still directed towards the united states , where the africans were brought to trial under murder .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in the court , various factions claim ownership of the slaves , and therefore try to seize them away .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the united states government , led by president martin van buren ( nigel hawthorne ) , and secretary of state secretary forsyth ( david paymer ) , try to ship the africans to spain , where an 11 year old isabella ii ( anna paquin ) wants them back .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the two spaniards who own " la amistad " want the slaves for themselves .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the american ship that found the slaves also wants them .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in the midst of this are two abolitionists ( stellan skaarsgard and morgan freeman ) , who want the slaves to be free .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they enlist the help of lawyer matthew mcconaughey , who tries to free them .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: through various legal proceedings , the case appears before the supreme court , where it is argued by ex-president john quincy adams ( anthony hopkins ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the film itself is a visual wonder .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: spielberg favorite janusz kaminski sets the film in a dark , somber mood when appropriate , and a visual setting when appropriate as well .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: at times , the film is very slow , and very methodical .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: however , spielberg is not at his finest here , because the courtroom scenes have a tendency to lag .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the film is , in essence , a courtroom drama , one whose events are oversimplified .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the characterization is also weak , displaying weaknesses in building up characters such as the lawyer baldwin ( mcconaughey ) , and especially morgan freeman's abolitionist .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but spielberg's finest work in the film , the opening scene , a scene of cinque's family , and the brutal voyage of the slaves to america , is altogether stunning .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is this emotional force that carries the film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: mcconaughey is superb as the lawyer defending the africans , hopkins is sensational as the old adams , freeman is outstanding when used ( spielberg vastly under uses his supreme talents ) , and the rest of the cast is stellar .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the movie , however , belongs to hounsou .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: his emotional intensity is brilliant .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: spielberg manages to make even the slowest scenes sparkle with focus on hounsou , and the film's extraordinary power is simply captivating .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the film is flawed , for most of the supporting characters are merely cardboard .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but that doesn't matter .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the story is a gripping one , and one of extreme importance .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: kudos to spielberg for finding it , finding the right men for the job , and letting the audience listen to the words of cinque .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a good job all around .
docs.label: positive
